results.title: Ned Kelly: paintings by Sidney Nolan
results.creator_credit: Tim Burstall, Alan Harkness, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
results.brief_description: The story of Australia’s best known bushranger is told through the paintings of Sidney Nolan, accompanied by a ballad played on the guitar. Made with the co-operation of the Museum of Modern Art of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tim Burstall, Alan Harkness, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
results.description: The story of Australia’s best known bushranger is told through the paintings of Sidney Nolan, accompanied by a ballad played on the guitar. Made with the co-operation of the Museum of Modern Art of Australia.
description_for_label: The story of Australia’s best known bushranger is told through the paintings of Sidney Nolan, accompanied by a ballad played on the guitar. Made with the co-operation of the Museum of Modern Art of Australia.

results.title: Nano-cadabra
results.material_description: Single channel moving image, colour and audio
results.brief_description: Baldino takes the theory of ‘Nano-technology’ as her jumping-off point to explore the connections between science, magic and wonder. Nano-Cadabra is composed of forty abstract narratives, each lasting five seconds or less. In these mini-events, an array of ambiguous objects interact, eerily suggesting movement on the molecular level. Nano-Cadabra also exists as a four-channel installation.
results.description: Baldino takes the theory of ‘Nano-technology’ as her jumping-off point to explore the connections between science, magic and wonder.
